general: <speak>Oh no. I’m having some trouble with that.<break strength="strong" /></speak>
fatal: Oops, something went wrong. Sorry. Please try again a little later.

onboarding: <speak>Welcome to 21 Days of Gratitude. Here, you’ll be able to log and share the things you’re grateful for, and every day I’ll reward you with a plant for your garden. Over time, watch it (and your wellbeing!) flourish!<break strength="strong" /></speak>
hasNotSavedTodaysSession: <speak>Welcome back to 21 Days of Gratitude.<break strength="strong" /> Let's grow your garden.<break strength="strong" /></speak>
hasSavedTodaysSession: <speak>Welcome back to 21 Days of Gratitude! Your gratitude is growing, but I can only add one plant per day.<break strength="strong" /></speak>
<speak>Welcome back to 21 Days of Gratitude! I love all your enthusiasm, but you can only express your gratitude once per day.<break strength="strong" /></speak>
hasFinishedGarden: <speak>Congrats on completing 21 days!<break strength="strong" /> Take a moment to explore everything you’re grateful for, and the journey you’ve just completed.<break strength="strong" /> If you like, when you’re ready, share the good news with friends and family!</speak>

text: <speak>Studies show expressing gratitude over 21 days, has a positive impact on health and happiness. Use this app to help you cultivate yours with a garden created just for you.<break strength="strong" /></speak>

inviteUser: Do you want to change the colors of the plants in your garden?
fallback: Sorry, I think perhaps I didn’t hear you right. Do you want to change the colors of the plants in your garden?

text: Great. You can choose Meadow or Valley. What’s your preference?

fallback: <speak>Sorry, I think perhaps I didn’t hear you right. You can choose between Meadow and Valley.<break strength="strong" /> Which would you prefer?</speak>

speech: <speak>Amazing. Your garden is finally complete!<break strength="strong" /> If you want, you can start a new one. Or take a moment to think about all the things you’re grateful for.<break strength="strong" /> When you’re ready, you can even share your garden with friends and family.<break strength="x-strong" /> Here are some things you can ask me about.<break strength="strong" />
displayText: Amazing. Your garden is finally complete! If you want, you can start a new one. Or take a moment to think about all the things you’re grateful for. When you’re ready, you can even share your garden with friends and family. Here are some things you can ask me about:
